content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Mr. Abbasi. I am not interested in discussing the price of the apartment. If you want to continue the negotiation, you must make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. How about 350 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is too low. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. How about 400 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is still not high enough. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. How about 450 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is still not high enough. I am looking for a higher price. 

[Question & Answer - Reminder]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
